/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is teeming with cars and pedestrians, adding a dynamic element to the image. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their facades adorned with various signs and advertisements. The overall color palette of the image is dominated by shades of blue, green, and gray, reflecting the urban landscape of Beijing.
